rows: The unique ID of the client. Retrieved while setting Okta up.

The URL of the identity provider’s single sign-on. For Microsoft Entra AD, this is usuallyhttps://login.microsoftonline.com/\<azure account="" id="">/saml2. Find out the settings of the added connector in your Microsoft account.

The URL of the identity provider’s single sign-off. For Microsoft Entra AD, this is usuallyhttps://logout.microsoftonline.com/\<azure account="" id="">/saml2. Find out the settings of the added connector in your Microsoft account.
html:
Parameter

Parameter Value

Microsoft Entra identifier

The unique ID of the client. Retrieved while setting Okta up.

SingleSignOnServiceUrl

The URL of the identity provider’s single sign-on. For Microsoft Entra AD, this is usually https://login.microsoftonline.com/\<azure account="" id="">/saml2. Find out the settings of the added connector in your Microsoft account.

SingleLogoutServiceUrl

The URL of the identity provider’s single sign-off. For Microsoft Entra AD, this is usually https://logout.microsoftonline.com/\<azure account="" id="">/saml2. Find out the settings of the added connector in your Microsoft account.
